trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_date" name="date" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 包装 XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_date" name="date" href=""> </xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关 XSD 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library 上 MSDN 库中的"XML 的数据类型参考"。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref>与指定的类<xref:System.DateTime>对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>用于初始化当前实例的对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object and an integer that indicates whether <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*> is a positive or negative value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref>与指定的类<xref:System.DateTime>对象和一个整数，指示是否<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*>是正数或负数的值。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer of less than 0 indicates a negative `sign`.
trans-unit.target: 小于 0 的整数，指示负`sign`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>用于初始化当前实例的对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates whether `value` is positive.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指示是否`value`为正。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的 SOAP 类型的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，该值指示当前的 SOAP 类型的 XSD。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定<xref:System.String>到<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate"></xref>对象。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The Parse method is capable of parsing strings in various formats.
trans-unit.target: Parse 方法是能够分析各种格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The recognizable string formats are composed out of the following format patterns.
trans-unit.target: 可识别的字符串格式由以下的格式模式。

trans-unit.source: |Format Pattern|Description|Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |yyyy|The year in 4-digit format.|1999, 1812| |MM|The numeric month.
Single-digit months have a leading zero.|11, 05| |dd|The day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 一位数的月份具有前导零。 |11、 05 | | dd |每月天数。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit days have a leading zero.|23, 09| |zzz|The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).
trans-unit.target: 单数字前有一个前导零。 |23，09 | | zzz |完整时区偏移量 （小时和分钟） 从通用协调时间 （格林威治标准时间）。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, 08:00|
trans-unit.target: 单位数的小时数有一个前导零。 |-07:00，08:00 |

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要转换。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A object that is obtained from value.
trans-unit.target: A 从获取的对象 value 。

trans-unit.source: value does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
trans-unit.target: value不包含日期和时间与任何识别的格式模式相对应。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the date and time of the current instance is positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的日期和时间的当前实例是正数或负数。

trans-unit.source: An integer of less than zero indicates a negative Sign.
trans-unit.target: 小于零的整数，指示负号。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates whether <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*> is positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指示是否<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*>是正数或负数。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*>作为一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*>返回

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Value*> in the format "yyyy-MM-dd" or "'-'yyyy-MM-dd" if <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDate.Sign*> is negative.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>为从获取<> *1> 格式"yyyy-月-日"或"'-' yyyy-月-日"如果<> *1> 为负。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的日期和时间的当前实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>包含的日期和时间的当前实例的对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 SOAP 类型的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，该值指示当前的 SOAP 类型的 XSD。</xref:System.String>
